<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> you who <S%H9575>trample<s%> the <S%H34>needy,<s%> to <S%H7673>do<s%> <S%H7673>away<s%> with the <S%H6041>humble<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H935>coming,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H306>God,<s%> "When I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> Not a <S%H7458>famine<s%> for <S%H3899>bread<s%> or a <S%H6772>thirst<s%> for <S%H4325>water,<s%> But <S%H3588>rather<s%> <S%H518><s%> for <S%H8085>hearing<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
